Reference

Top-level fitting functions

Main functions for simulating, sampling and inferring an SBM with missing data

SBM_fit

R6 Class definition of an SBM-fit

SBM_sampler

An R6 Class to represent a sampler for a SBM

dyadSampler

Virtual class for all dyad-centered samplers

er_network

ER ego centred network

estimate()

Inference of an SBM with missing data

frenchblog2007

Political Blogosphere network prior to 2007 French presidential election

missSBM

An R package for adjusting Stochastic Block Models from networks data sampled under various missing data conditions

missSBM_collection

An R6 Class to represent a collection of missSBM_fit

missingSBM_fit

R6 Class definition of an SBM-fit

networkSampler

Definition of R6 Class 'networkSampling_sampler'

networkSampling

definition of R6 Class 'networkSampling'

networkSamplingDyads_fit

Virtual class used to define a family of networkSamplingDyads_fit

networkSamplingNodes_fit

Virtual class used to define a family of networkSamplingNodes_fit

sample()

Sampling of network data

sampledNetwork

An R6 Class to represent a sampler for a SBM

simulate()

Simulation of an SBM

smooth()

Smooth path of models in a collection

war_graphs

War_graphs data set

Classes of object fit

Description of the classes of objects used in missSBM to manipulate network data, model and sampling design.

missingSBM_fit

R6 Class definition of an SBM-fit
